bio: 1988- Doubles SF Johannesburg Ch., Durban Ch. (w/Barnard).
1987- Doubles Runner-up at Raleigh, Seattle Ch. (w/MacPherson).
1984- Winner at Perth Ch.; Quarterfinalist at Tel Aviv; Doubles SF at Geneva
Earned a degree in economics and marketing from the University of Miami
(Florida) in 1982. Turned pro in 1982. His father is an accountant in South
